Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: genai made me think critically about the answers it was providing and whether it was correct or met the needs of my study. teachers while reliable are not as accessible to ask questions to confirm understanding of concepts

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: dont generally interact with lecturers as they feel unapproachable, more often interact with tutor staff, however, these tutors often have a lot of students asking them questions so it feels like if youre asking something it will be rushed. Genai, while less reliable is easier to work with and get more immediate answers
